summary: Completed partial testing of Charlie Foods checkout flow. Cart functionality and UI contrast improvements are working, but critical checkout form navigation issue prevents testing of delivery options and address field validation.

critical_bugs.issue: Checkout form does not appear when clicking 'Commander' button
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks testing of delivery options, address fields, and form validation
critical_bugs.description: The Commander button is visible and clickable but does not navigate to the checkout form with delivery options and address fields

ui_bugs.issue: Quantity +/- controls not visible in cart items
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot modify item quantities in cart
ui_bugs.description: Expected quantity controls with plus/minus buttons are not appearing in cart item display

passed_tests: Page loads successfully with Charlie Foods branding
Cart modal opens and displays with proper contrast (dark text on white background)
Cart functionality works - items can be added to cart
Cart badge shows correct item count in header
Cart items display with good contrast - item names, descriptions, and prices clearly visible
Menu section displays with good contrast and readable text
Add buttons are functional and responsive
Empty cart state displays properly with appropriate messaging

success_percentage.backend: N/A - Backend testing skipped as requested

action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix checkout form navigation - the 'Commander' button in CartModal does not show the checkout form with delivery options and address fields. This prevents testing of the main requested features: delivery options visibility, address field validation, postal code validation, and form input contrast. Also fix missing quantity controls in cart items.
